trans-unit.source: Describes the version of a <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref>.

The DataRowVersion values are used when retrieving the value found in a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> using <xref:System.Data.DataRow.Item%2A> or the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.GetChildRows%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object.
The DataRowVersion informs you what version of a <xref:System.Data.DataRow> exists.

Versions change under the following circumstances: - After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.BeginEdit%2A> method, if you change the value, the `Current` and `Proposed` values become available.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.CancelEdit%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is deleted.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.EndEdit%2A> method, the Proposed value becomes the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.AcceptChanges%2A> method, the `Original` value becomes identical to the `Current` value.
- After calling the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RejectChanges%2A> method, the `Proposed` value is discarded, and the version becomes `Current`.

For a <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataRowState" name="DataRowState" href=""></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Added" name="Added" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modified" name="Modified" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Deleted" name="Deleted" href=""></xref>, the default version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Current" name="Current" href=""></xref>.

For a <xref href="System.Data.DataRowState"></xref> value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_Detached" name="Detached" href=""></xref>, the version is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Proposed" name="Proposed" href=""></xref>.
The row contains its original values.
The row contains a proposed value.
